TITLE: Episode 106 - Watching the Warhawks with Kyle Anzalone
DESCRIPTION: The vixens are taking a break from talking about CovAIDS to discuss foreign policy with Kyle Anzalone, writer/journalist for The Libertarian Institute and Antiwar.com. He’s also co-host of Conflicts of Interest podcast. Listen to learn more background on recent history of US foreign relations with Ukraine and Russia.
CONTENT: The vixens are taking a break from talking about CovAIDS to discuss foreign policy with [Kyle Anzalone](https://twitter.com/KyleAnzalone_), writer/journalist for [The Libertarian Institute](https://libertarianinstitute.org/) and [Antiwar.com](https://antiwar.com/). He’s also co-host of [Conflicts of Interest](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXsiX0NOIXbKLd8kNPbKjjQ) podcast. Listen to learn more background on recent history of US foreign relations with Ukraine and Russia.
